articles.title: Apple’s Major Investment Cements Houston as a Leading U.S. Manufacturing and Tech Hub - Greater Houston Partnership
articles.description: Houston has a scored a major win in the global manufacturing and technology race. Apple announced plans to open an advanced manufacturing facility in the Houston region.
articles.content: Houston has a scored a major win in the global manufacturing and technology race. Apple announced plans to open an advanced manufacturing facility in the Houston region. Part of a $500 billion nation… [+2684 chars]
